title: Survey on amount of money spent on boating in the U.S. 2012
summary: The chart shows the Percentage of boat owners at the U.S. street .
\\n The highest Percentage was 30.5 in the $2000_to_$4999 Yearly followed by 15.5 percentage in the $500_to_$999 Yearly , 30.5 percentage in $2000_to_$4999 and finally 15.5 percentage in over_$5000 .
gold: The statistic depicts the amount of money boat owners in the U.S. spent on boating in 2012 . 18.3 percent of the respondents stated that they spent between $ 1,000 and $ 1,999 on boating in 2012 .
